text: Ate uha hi hai, jisa ne akasam ate dharati nu che dinam vica bana'i'a usa da sighasana pani upara si, tam ki uha tuhadi prikhi'a lave ki kauna tuhade tom caga kama karada hai. Jekara tusim kaho ki marana tom ba'ada tusim loka mura utha'e ja'oge tam inakari kahide hana ki iha tam pratakha jadu hai
